title: New Ecobee Premium and Enhanced thermostat leaks, support for Alexa and Siri built-in
content:
When you’re looking for information on upcoming but as yet unannounced hardware, everyone knows you should head to Canadian Tire. No, really, of all the retailers to out a new product, here we are. As highlighted by ZatsNotFunny and a Reddit thread, Ecobee has a new Premium and Enhanced model thermostat on the way it

The post New Ecobee Premium and Enhanced thermostat leaks, support for Alexa and Siri built-in appeared first on XDA.
description: Fans of Ecobee thermostats will be interested in this new leak that details a Premium and an Enhanced model seemingly on the way
